channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Comparatif : quelles sont les meilleures enceintes Bluetooth en 2026 ?
item.description: Compactes et nomades, les enceintes Bluetooth s'invitent partout : du salon à la plage, elles sont devenues indispensables. Bienvenue sur notre sélection des meilleurs modèles testés par nos soins.

item.title: SpaceX wants to launch a constellation of a million satellites to power AI needs
item.description: Elon Musk and his aerospace company have requested to build a network that's 100 times the number of satellites that are currently in orbit. On Friday, SpaceX filed an application with the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to launch a million satellites meant to create an "orbital data center." This isn't the first time we're hearing of Musk's plans to build an orbital data center, as it was mentioned by company insiders following the news that the CEO was reportedly preparing to take SpaceX public. According to the filing spotted by PCMag, this data center would run off solar power and ...

item.title: Nvidia CEO pushes back against report that his company’s $100B OpenAI investment has stalled
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said that a recent report of friction between his company and OpenAI was “nonsense.”

item.title: Liverpool vs Newcastle Live Streams: TV Channels, Preview & Team News for Premier League 2025/26 clash at Anfield
item.description: All the ways to watch Liverpool vs Newcastle as the Reds eye a first Premier League win of 2026 against Eddie Howe's Mags.

item.title: WWE Royal Rumble 2026 — Stream it *FREE* from anywhere
item.description: Here's a quick guide on how to watch Royal Rumble 2026 for free as WWE's premium event hits our screens this weekend.

item.title: The Original ‘Saw’ Team Is Leading the Franchise’s Return
item.description: James Wan and Leigh Whannell are reuniting to revitalize 'Saw' and make it scary franchise again.

item.title: RayNeo Air 3s Pro review: Getting my mind to adjust to the 201-inch screen simulation took a while - but once it did, these display glasses proved impressive
item.description: Are you missing the cinematic experience, huddling over a small screen on your daily commute? Then the Neo Air 3S Pro wearable display glasses are the solution. Simply plug them into your phone and suddenly you have access to a simulated 201-inch projection screen, all in a device no larger than a standard pair of spectacles.

item.title: Heated Rivalry lived up to the hype — here are 9 other movies and shows I wish I’d watched sooner
item.description: Heated Rivalry was just one of the many movies and shows that left a mark on me this month, alongside The Lord of the Rings and a heart-breaking romantic drama.

item.title: Un océan disparu refait surface : cette découverte sur Mars bouleverse les scientifiques
item.description: En analysant les données sismiques collectées par les instruments de l'atterrisseur Insight de la Nasa il y a plusieurs années, des géophysiciens pensent avoir trouvé des preuves de l'existence d'un grand réservoir souterrain d'eau liquide dans la croûte de Mars, suffisamment pour remplir les...

item.title: Test du Canon EOS R6 Mark III : la mise à jour tant attendue d’un best-seller polyvalent
item.description: Cinq ans après la sortie du très apprécié EOS R6 Mark II, Canon est revenu fin 2025 avec l'un des boîtiers les plus attendus de l'année. Proposant une mise à jour pensée comme un peaufinage plutôt qu'une révolution, la marque affiche désormais un nouvel étendard de polyvalence face à la concurrence.
